name: Bike Epic Driving Stunting
description:
Bike Epic Driving Stunting is a fast and epic driving and stunting stunts game. Gives you a chance to drive and stunt at super-fast speed on sky tracks. Swipe on gas button, smacks the gas to increase your speed. Ride on your dirt bike and get ready for exciting racing challenge! Move fast by accelerating the dirt bike dodge hurdles. Face real exciting and trilling difficulties in every level. Due to natural and realistic graphics you feel comfortable during game difficulties and thrilling levels. Drive your real road bike on sky tracks through narrow sky tracks path stunts on-ramp, hurdles and other obstacles.
Features:
- Exciting exploratory tracks in the sky to race dirt bike on it
- Special kinds of obstacles in the way on the bike track
- Eye-catching and thrilling 3D sky bike racing levels
- Super cool and interesting game graphics
- Different kinds of hurdles in the way on the impossible track.
